tool_description: API use to get a collection of fun fact about some country
name: Collection Fun
title: Collection Fun

api_list.name: default
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://collection-fun.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "collection-fun.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://collection-fun.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "collection-fun.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
